page.title: 201985-EVENLODE SCHOOL PENARTH
page.content: { Charities}were supported through the year.A{successful Christmas concert was held so in January Â£175 was sent to{Leukaemia}Fund,the local hospital. After a sponsored "Spell"Â£250 was sent to the{Ethopian}Fund.As part of the Goodwill day celebrations a donation of Â£350 was sent to the R.N.I.B.Girl won{S.Glam."Peace Poem"competition. Class 6 won a prize for planning a {Heritage}walk.2 girls in class 9 won vouchers for designing a guide book {cover.St.David's Day celebrations included an eisteddfod with Crowning the Bard-the best poem writer.Singers and musicians entertained pensioners.A number of educational visits were made J3.to{Bath youth}hostel,J4.to N.Wales' adventure week.Netball,lacrosse,rugby and football matches were played.Top classes active in{Domesday}work,super- vised by M.Jones and K.Evans.
